data.question: What is the chemical formula for X-dia-4-Co-α?

What is the space group of X-dia-5-Co-β?
What method was used for the absorption correction in single-crystal X-ray diffraction measurements?
What is the crystal system of X-dia-4-Co-β?
What is the formula weight of X-dia-5-Co-α?
What is the volume (V) of the unit cell for X-dia-4-Co-β?
Did X-dia-4-Co-α undergo a phase transformation upon heating?
data.answer: Yes, it started to undergo a phase transformation at 70 °C and completed at 90 °C.

data.question: Is the CO2 adsorption in X-dia-5-Co endothermic or exothermic?
data.answer: Exothermic, as indicated by negative adsorption enthalpy values.

data.question: Does X-dia-4-Co exhibit flexibility upon CO2 adsorption?
data.answer: Yes, it shows flexibility as indicated by changes in unit cell parameters upon CO2 adsorption.

data.question: What is the Langmuir surface area for X-dia-4-Co?

Does X-dia-4-Co-β have a higher density compared to X-dia-4-Co-α?
Is the CO2 adsorption in X-dia-4-Co spontaneous at 298 K?
data.answer: True, as indicated by negative Gibbs free energy values.
